definition: to wail/to cry out in distress
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Four-four was Madame de Genlis's signal.
sentences.chinese: 四下接四下是讓利斯夫人的呼號。

sentences.english: And I was very angry when I heard their cry and these words.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見他們呼號說這些話，便甚發怒。

sentences.english: The trees bent as the north wind howled through them.
sentences.chinese: 北風呼號而過，樹都吹彎了。

sentences.english: It was a road from singing for himself to crying out for people.
sentences.chinese: 他走的是一條從爲個人詠歎到爲人民呼號的道路。

sentences.english: Sorry, you are not authorized to update the callsign database.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，您無權以更新呼號數據庫。

sentences.english: Neither is stimulus of old factories or yelling in frustration and anger.
sentences.chinese: 陳舊工廠的激怒或是沮喪與悲憤中的呼號也不能。

sentences.english: It glowed redly in the gloom, just for a moment, and then faded.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中呼號散發着詭祕的紅光，然後又暗了下來。

sentences.english: What was William Adama's call sign?
sentences.chinese: 威廉。阿達瑪的呼號是什麼？

sentences.english: Echoes of cries of pain rever berate in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦的呼號的回聲在我心裏迴盪。

sentences.english: The enigmatic Marine, Shane Schofield, who goes by the call-sign "Scarecrow."
sentences.chinese: 神祕的海洋，肖恩菲爾德，誰的呼號“稻草人去。”

sentences.english: What is your name and call sign?
sentences.chinese: 你的船名和呼號是什麼？

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I didn't copy your callsign. Please again slowly.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我沒有抄收你的呼號，請慢慢重複。

sentences.english: What is your name, call sign?
What is the last letter in your call sign?
sentences.chinese: 你呼號的最後一個字母是什麼？

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
security measures (esp. border security)/official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)
fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
